MINUTES OF Telephone Conference held before Judge Mariana R. Pfaelzer: The case is called and appearances are made. Court and counsel discuss the Motion to Stay, arbitration, opting out of the class action and the Oppenheimer case. The Court Orders a further Telephonic Conference Call on Monday, September 15, 2008 at 2:00 p.m. Court Reporter: Leandra Amber. (pso) (Entered: 09/18/2008)

MINUTES OF Telephone Conference held before Judge Mariana R. Pfaelzer: The case is called and appearances are made. Court and counsel discuss arbitration, opting out of the class action and the Oppenheimer case. The Motion to Compel Arbitration will be filed on or before September 22, 2008, Opposition will be due on or before October 2, 1008, Reply will be due on or before October 7, 2008. The Court sets the Motion to Compel for hearing on Tuesday, October 14, 2008 at 1:00 p.m. Court Reporter: Margaret Babykin. (pso) (Entered: 09/18/2008)

ORDER by Judge Mariana R. Pfaelzer: IT IS ORDERED: (1) That Defendants' Motion to Stay Proceedings filed on 9/4/2008 10 is withdrawn. (2) That Defendants may have to and including 9/22/2008 within which to file a Motion to Compel Arbitration. Plaintiff's Opposition is due on 10/2/2008 and Defendants' reply is due 10/7/2008. The Motion will be heard on 10/14/2008. (3) That if the Motion to Compel Arbitration is denied, Defendants shall have 14 days from the date of the Court's Order to file an Answer or Motion pursuant to FRCP 12. (gk) (Entered: 09/25/2008)

NOTICE TO FILER OF DEFICIENCIES in Electronically Filed Documents. The following error(s) was found: Incorrect event selected. Correct event is Responses, Replies and Other Motion Related Documents - Notice of Motion. Case number is incorrect or missing. Motions - Compel Arbitration event utilized in docketing this filing. Counsel's docket entries created 12 duplicative pending motions on the calendar for 10/14/2008. Clerk has terminated the duplicative calendar dates as the Petition (document number 16) set the 10/14/2008 hearing date. This filing reflects case number 08-cv-00763-MRP-AN. The correct case number is SACV 08-00763 MRP (ANx) RE: Defendants' Notice of (1) Petition to Compel Arbitration, and (2) Motion to stay Proceedings filed 9/22/2008 15 . In response to this notice the court may order (1) an amended or correct document to be filed (2) the document stricken or (3) take other action as the court deems appropriate. (gk) (Entered: 09/26/2008)

NOTICE OF MOTION AND MOTION for Reconsideration re Order, Case Stayed 49 filed by Plaintiff Hansen Beverage Company. (Attachments: # 1 Memorandum in Support of Motion for Reconsideration)(McIntyre, Edward) (Entered: 10/17/2008)

ORDER by Judge Mariana R. Pfaelzer re: MOTION for Reconsideration re Order 49 50 . The Court has reviewed Plaintiffs motion for reconsideration. Given these three considerations, among others, the arbitration agreement is not unconscionable under either California or New York law. Hansens motion for reconsideration is DENIED. (See Order for details) (kpa) (Entered: 10/22/2008)

NOTICE of Voluntary Dismissal filed by Plaintiff Hansen Beverage Company. Dismissal is With Prejudice. (McIntyre, Edward) (Entered: 03/26/2010)

ORDER DISMISSING CASE WITH PREJUDICE 54 by Judge Mariana R. Pfaelzer. It is hereby ORDERED THAT: 1. The complaint is hereby dismissed, with prejudice; and 2. Each party shall bear its own attorneys fees, costs and expenses. (lom) (Entered: 03/31/2010)
